title: Banned
body: Interesting did anyone else got banned for scripts in league of legends for using Mkjogo i think but i didn't saw email I didn't knew it was bannable for.

replies.body:
Mkjogo provides some information that other players do not get through the default client, which makes it unfair to use and is why it is bannable. I believe typically they give you a temporary ban as a warning for using some of the less serious "cheating programs", and will do so whether you used that particular feature or not. Was your ban permanent or temporary? If you need more information on your punishment you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

For some guidance on the use of 3rd party applications, you can refer to the following posts;

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications

Using any unauthorized third party programs, including mods, hacks, cheats, scripts, bots, trainers and automation programs that interact with the Software in any way, for any purpose, including any unauthorized third party programs that intercept, emulate, or redirect any communication between the Software and Riot Games and any unauthorized third party programs that collect information about the Game by reading areas of memory used by the Software to store information;

But please could you investigate my ban? because support declined my request to repeat my account investigation

I can't. This specific program is well known to be off limits, and Player Support has made their decision, sorry. The most you can really do is reopen your ticket and ask why you didn't get a warning first, assuming you did not.
But Mk jogo its not program that gives advantage its just model textures and textures are allowed in allowed program list

Mkjogo does more than that. Even if you are not using the feature that makes it illegal, the entire program is still off limits. Any modification is technically off limits, though they don't currently pursue punishment for custom skins; if you are unsure where the program you want to use lies, err on the side of caution and don't bother using it at all.
